body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello and thank you for reaching out to Car Deals Plus. My name is Noah Stewart and I'm here to assist you today. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Noah, my name is Sarah Diaz.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the inventory listed on your website.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is s.diaz@email.com and my phone number is five five five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. I have noted your information. Can you also confirm your mailing address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my mailing address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State ABC, zip code one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Sarah?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Noah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
